en: They [i.e., the hypocrites] will call to them [i.e., the believers], "Were we not with you?"
and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted,

ar: وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْأَمَانِىُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ
en: and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah.
And the Deceiver [i.e., Satan] deceived you concerning Allah.
